sub_title: Global Technology Manager - Data & Analytics Platform Architecture @ JACOBS DOUWE EGBERTS
summary:
Certified Data & Analytics professional with over 12 years of experience working with Business Intelligence tools and concepts. Currently working as Global Technology Manager of Data & Analytics platforms driving the roadmap and strategy of the D&A platforms and processes across the globe. 

Solid experience with SAP BW and HANA models, SAP BO reports and Tableau analysis, as well as Microsoft Azure architecture solutions, including Power BI. Advanced work with the report design and KPIs development for various departments including Logistics, Controlling, Finance, Sales, HR, Marketing and CRM in retail, media, chemicals, engineering-construction and CPG related industries. 

Experience with business processes such as Finance & Controlling (Financial Planning), Sales Performance Management, Marketing Campaigning. SAP experience includes technical skills in  BW, BO WebIntelligence/Explorer (Desktop and Mobile), BO Dashboards, BO Data Services tools and Analytics tools such as Tableau. Microsoft Azure Cloud experience include Data Lake Storage/Blob storage, Azure Data Factory, Synapse Analytics, Databricks and Power BI.

Possesses technical knowledge of programming languages: ABAP, COBOL, Visual Basic, JAVA, Delphi, HTML, PHP. Database experience with Access, MySql and SQL Server 2000 and Oracle.

FCE (First Certificate in English) certified and tested 910 out of 990 on TOEIC English certification test. Available for travel and relocation.

certifications.name: No Code AI and Machine Learning - Building Data Science Solutions
Microsoft Certified: Azure Enterprise Data Analyst Associate
2018 LATAM Data & Analytics Summit - Brasil - Certficate Of Attendance

projects.title: EDP - Workshop for SAP BEx and WAD
projects.description: Provide knowledge to final users regarding the reporting tools SAP Business Explorer and Web Application Designer on a 3 day workshop with the main developments allowed by the tools.

contributors.headline: Global Technology Manager - Data & Analytics Platform Architecture @ JACOBS DOUWE EGBERTS

projects.title: Braskem - Bucket of Expenditure – Wave 3: Migration to HANA Views
projects.description: Working as Lead Architect and developer on SAP HANA to migrate the solution once developed on SAP BW 7.4 to HANA Views. Eight HANA views were developed to fulfill all the requirements, such as two hierarchies, custom access control based on the hierarchies, currency conversion and calculated columns providing the desired KPIs. The HANA views will be accessed by Tableau, improving the performance and user experience on the solution. Working as responsible for the development and managing technical/professional skills of partner’s consultants.

contributors.headline: Global Technology Manager - Data & Analytics Platform Architecture @ JACOBS DOUWE EGBERTS

projects.title: Braskem - Bucket of Expenditure – Wave 2: Frontend
projects.description: After the devolpment of the backend in the new EDW LSA architecture in BW 7.4 on SAP HANA, the Tableau tool was choosen to be the deliverable of a panel for the new costs analysis of the company. Working as responsible for the development and managing technical/professional skills of partner’s consultants.

projects.title: Lojas Marisa S/A - Marketing Campaign Management with SAP CRM
projects.description: Unify the client’s customer databases to automate the marketing campaign of the CRM area, using the ETL tool Business Objects Data Services (BODS), all data was unified and the required transformations were applied, the business rules were implemented and a Business Partners in SAP CRM tool was created. Also the transactional data was extracted in order to measure the ROI of marketing campaigns, populating SAP BW with this data through SAP BODS.

profile_positions.title: Global Technology Manager - Data & Analytics Platform Architecture

profile_positions.description:
Relocated from Brazil to drive JDE's analytics transformation and bring innovation to the over 260 years old company located in Utrecht, Netherlands. JDE had different analytics systems spread across the countries, without a global template and relying on local solutions. The main objective was to create a global template of tools and processes, simplify the platforms while bringing value and innovation, and transform the company into a data-driven mindset.
Responsible for the implementation of the Data Lake and new visualization and data blending platforms for the business, as well as the decommission of the legacy systems in the local businesses. Supported the activation of the DevOps teams on Data & Analytics, improving the delivery of projects and the general customer satisfaction of our businesses.
profile_positions.title: Global BI & Analytics Architect

profile_positions.description: Business Intelligence Architect, responsible for architecture modeling and report development for Procurement and Controlling departments utilizing SAP BW 7.4 with LSA++ architecture and HANA Views on HANA Studio, along with front end tools such as Query Designer and Analyzer, Analysis Edition for Office, BO WebIntelligence and Tableau. Actual data extraction from SAP ECC in the areas of stock review, purchasing and fixes costs and planned data incorporation via SAP Business Planning and Consolidation tool. Support front-end dashboard development using SAP Business Object tools, while supporting technical and professional development of junior analysts in Brazil and USA.
